title: The Federal Reserve's Review of Its Monetary Policy Strategy, Tools, and Communication Practices
content: For release on delivery  9:45 a.m. EDT (8:45 a.m. CDT)  June 5, 2019      The Federal Reserve’s Review of Its Monetary Policy Strategy, Tools, and  Communication Practices    Remarks by     Richard H. Clarida     Vice Chair     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at the     Conference on Monetary Policy Strategy, Tools, and Communication Practices  (A Fed Listens Event)   Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago     Chicago, Illinois                 June 5, 2019
